snippet.title: Sonic Colors Demastered - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
After months and months of incredibly hard work I'm excited to finally give you all a glimpse at the fangame I've been working on. Look forward to a full demo being available at this year's SAGE Expo, and stay tuned for updates!

The incredible remix of "Reach for the Stars" was done by my friend KITSUN3POWR and will be included as part of the official game's soundtrack! You can check out the full song on their channel here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nvmLoZjPPqs

Download the Game Here:
SAGE: https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-colors-demastered-sage-22-demo.1326/
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/sonic-colors-demastered/764823
Itch.io: https://randomocity-gaming.itch.io/sonic-colors-demastered

My Gamedev Twitter: https://twitter.com/randomocitygmng
